What are the advantages of pneumatic systems over hydraulic systems?

choices.text: Pneumatic systems possess a high power density, which makes them ideal for heavy-load applications.
Pneumatic systems provide precise control and positioning, ensuring accurate and repeatable movements.
Pneumatic systems tend to operate more quietly than hydraulic systems.
Pneumatic offer quick response times, making them ideal for applications that demand rapid movements.
